name: Mario Platformer - Scratch
description:
A game I made for a Digital Education class around one year ago, and I've decided to post it here inside of itch.io. If you have any suggestions, I'll gladly read them and try to add them into the game. Also, try the konami code (using arrows, not WASD) :D. Oh, and, congratulations if you found the Easter Egg.

Game Link: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/531834093/
